raw_body:
TOTAWATTE – DONA PRINCY (nee Akmeemana). Dearly beloved wife of late Shelton Totawatte (Retired Government – Audit Officer),​ loving mother of Nilanthi (Ex People’s Bank),​ Sumith – (Ex Dimo) – Australia,​ mother-in-law of late Ronald Devendra and Sriyani Patricia – Australia and all her grandchildren,​ daughter of late Matin Mattew and Nancy Naglin,​ sister of late Clarence,​ Romulus,​ late George,​ late Sumitra and Nirmala,​ called to the arms of Jesus on 17th April 2024. Remains lie at No. 14,​ Prathibimbarama Road,​ Kalubowila,​ Dehiwala on Friday 19th April 2024 from 9.00 a.m. onwards and burial at 4 p.m. at Mount Lavinia Cemetery (Roman Catholic Section). (Mobile 0774 128 481 & 0743 412 507)
025708
